title: Looking for ranked q buddies!
body:
I'm Silver 5 atm, looking to climb the solo q ladder, however, I would like to q with some other players. Chuck me a friend request so we can climb together! I'm a top and jungle main but it doesn't really matter what lanes you main as long as you are serious about climbing the ladder.
 {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: hey possibly looking to join you guys as an arc main. i have quite a big champion pool and I'm smurfing in bronze 4 right now and i wud like to climb with you and others. Ill see you a friend request and we can talk about it there
sent you a friend request! maybe we could talk about duo queue?
